txt.en: 'Legolas has requested your assistance with a matter of great importance in Cirith Ungol.

'[placeholder], Legolas has requested your assistance with a matter of great importance in Cirith Ungol. I was asked to send you his way, if you are able. Mablung and a few others have set up camp somewhere in the cliffs, but I do not know how to find the camp myself. Halhir should be stationed on the Morgul-road in that area; just follow it west and you should come across him eventually. He should be able to direct you further.'
Halhir can be found somewhere along the Morgul-road, somewhere to the west.\n\nYou should find Halhir.
I see Legolas's call has reached you!
Legolas has asked that you come to Cirith Ungol when you are able to assist him with some unfinished business.
Halhir waves as you travel down the road. He smiles as you approach.\n\n'Greetings, [placeholder]! I see Legolas's call has reached you!'
